name: Clockwork (itch) (matthewdadoun)
description:
Sarah, Reggie, and Annie decide to spend a Saturday hanging out at Johnny's place. Reggie's mom tells him he must be home before 8pm. However, the grandfather clock at Johnny's isn't working, just as soon as it's getting dark outside, before Reggie has to leave! Despite numerous warnings from his parents not to touch the grandfather clock, Johnny decides to touch it. Suddenly, the clock zaps the children inside!

An old man floats from above in a mysterious place."Who are you?" asked Annie. "My name is Bartholomew! I am the grandfather of this grandfather clock. I have come to warn you of the terrible dangers that are in this clock! You children are the saviors we have been waiting for for over 100 years!" "100 years?" Sarah asks. "Yes, 100 years. This clock has been dysfunctional for almost 100 years. You must vanquish the evils among us! They have been blocking the sacred red button that will fix time." Reggie starts worrying. "What about my mom? She said I had to be back home by 8pm." Bartholomew exclaims "Do not worry about your mother. The entire world outside is stuck in time limbo while you kids' sworn duty is to vanquish these evils and restore time to its former glory. I will watch your every move." Bartholomew vanishes.

Reggie says "Well, if I want to get home, we need to do as ol' geezer says!" The children agree, and step out into the vast grandfather clock to perform the duty sworn to them.

CONTROLS (FIELD)
Arrow Keys/WASD - Move around field

CONTROLS (BATTLE) 

Arrow Keys - Move cursor

ENTER - Select input
